item.title: Great American Beer Festival
item.description: Background Tidy Tuesday The Great American Beer Festival Analysis State Rankings Table Animated Map Interactive TIE Fighter Plot & Line Chart Brewery, Category, & Beer Table Award Winning Categories by State Wrapping Up /* kableExtra tables & skimr */ table { font-size: 13px; width: 850px; margin: auto; border-top: 1px solid #666; border-bottom: 1px solid #666; } table thead th { font-size: 14px; border-bottom: 1px solid #ddd; } th, td { padding: 10px; } tr:hover { background-color: #F8F8F8; } /* reactable */ /* Styles for the column headers */ .
